body_html:
Hi, the quantized training rewrites are documented and available here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/quantize

Note, they will not work on all models, though we are working on improving how well they generalize.

You can convert these Fake quantized models to fully quantized mobile models via TensorFlow Lite.
https://www.tensorflow.org/mobile/tflite/

body:
Hi, the quantized training rewrites are documented and available here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/quantize

Note, they will not work on all models, though we are working on improving how well they generalize.

You can convert these Fake quantized models to fully quantized mobile models via TensorFlow Lite.
https://www.tensorflow.org/mobile/tflite/
